articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The warrants are for alleged war crimes and crimes against humanity.
articles.title: ICC issues arrest warrants for Israel's Netanyahu, Gallant and Hamas leader

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: It's the first time Russia has used such a powerful, long-range missile during the war.
articles.title: Russia launches intercontinental ballistic missile in attack on Ukraine, Kyiv says

articles.author: Ricardo Brito
articles.description: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro plotted a coup to overturn the 2022 election along with dozens of ex-ministers and senior aides, federal police said in a formal accusation filed on Thursday with the country's Supreme Court.
articles.title: Brazil police accuse Bolsonaro and ex-ministers of 2022 coup plot

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has accused the United States of ramping up tension and provocations, saying the Korean peninsula has never faced such risks of nuclear war as now, state media KCNA said on Friday.
articles.title: North Korea's Kim accuses US of stoking tension, warns of nuclear war, KCNA says

articles.author: Francois Murphy
articles.description: The aim is to pressure Iran into entering negotiations on new restrictions on its nuclear activities.
articles.title: IAEA Board passes Iran resolution as West pushes Tehran towards talks

articles.author: Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali
articles.description: The United States believes that Russia fired a never-before-fielded intermediate-range ballistic missile on Thursday in its attack on Ukraine, an escalation that analysts say could have implications for European missile defense.
articles.title: US believes Russia's attack in Ukraine showcased new missile

articles.author: Crispian Balmer, Tom Perry
articles.description: Airstrikes pounded Beirut's southern suburbs and rockets flew into northern Israel.
articles.title: Israel, Hezbollah trade deadly blows despite ceasefire talks

articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge, Marina Bobrova, Maxim Rodionov
articles.description: President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that the Ukraine war was escalating towards a global conflict after the United States and Britain allowed Ukraine to hit Russia with their weapons, and warned the West that Moscow could strike back.
articles.title: Putin says Ukraine war is going global

articles.author: Mike Stone, Humeyra Pamuk, Matt Spetalnick
articles.description: President Joe Biden dropped his opposition to Ukraine firing U.S. missiles at targets deep inside Russia in response to North Korea's entry to the war, a shift in U.S. policy that took on added urgency following Donald Trump's Nov. 5 election win, sources familiar with the matter said.
articles.title: Biden's shift on missiles for Ukraine informed by North Korean troops in Kursk, Trump's election victory

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te will visit Tuvalu, Palau and Marshall Islands in the Pacific, the presidential office said on Friday.
articles.title: Taiwan's president to visit Tuvalu, Palau and Marshall Islands
